====== Simple result

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:floristics-full-protocol-shapes:growth-form:simple-result`
|Label | Simple result
|Definition | The observation's `sosa:hasSimpleResult` _MUST_ have a value that is the same as the value in the value node of `sosa:hasResult`.
